found in a mural in a neolithic grave in henan puyang (河南濮陽西水坡新石器時代古墓) clam shells arranged in the shape of big dipper in the north (北斗bei dou) and below the foot, tiger in the west and azure dragon in the east. also showing five stars

contained 75 central constellation and 42 outer constellations, some said 510 stars in 18 constellations
